titles.title: DTV Coupon Assistance Act of 2008
To allow a refundable credit against Federal income tax for expired digital-to-analog converter box coupons.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/25/2008--Introduced. DTV Coupon Assistance Act of 2008 - Allows individual taxpayers a refundable tax credit for $40 for each of their expired digital-to-analog converter box coupons, up to a maximum of $80.
